Description:
Detects a privilege elevation attempt by coercing NTLM authentication on the Printer Spooler service

Author: Elastic (idea), Tobias Michalski (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious NTLM Authentication on the Printer Spooler Service
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and original_file_name = 'rundll32.exe') and ((command like '%c:\windows\system32\davclnt.dll,davsetcookie%' and command like '%http%') and (command like '%spoolss%' or command like '%srvsvc%' or command like '%/print/pipe/%')))
